pkgmetadata.longdescription: Access Publisher Copyright Self-Archiving Policies via the 'SHERPA/RoMEO' API // Fetches information from the 'SHERPA/RoMEO' API http://www.sherpa.ac.uk/romeo/apimanual.php which indexes policies of journal regarding the archival of scientific manuscripts before and/or after peer-review as well as formatted manuscripts.
